issue.title: Hidden and Visible fields are not saved in XML (MD edition)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Fields _hidden_ and _visible_ are not saved with their default values in metadata edition.

All _hidden_ fields rendered as lists are removed from DOM, so they're not posted, and not saved in metadata XML.
All _visible_ fields rendered as lists are shown but the default value is not set, nor saved in XML.

Note: I cannot affect this to an exact version.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Problem solved for visible and hidden lists with a *single default value*.
The case of multiple default values will be the subject of a new issue.
